name: Self-study
description: Started my journey as a developer by learning from online courses such as Codecademy and freeCodeCamp while continuing my education of advanced concepts thru blogs, YouTube, and books.
imageAlt: A cup of coffee sitting on a laptop. Image by AltumCode.

name: FreeCodeCamp Organizer
description: Organized community events for people who shared a common interest in learning how to code. I held multiple classes, talks, and devoted my time helping others to learn.
imageAlt: A freeCodeCamp community event held at a coffee shop. Image by Billy Le.

name: Kore Innovations
description: First contract position and professional job as a developer where I worked with Ruby on Rails which was an unfamiliar technology. Worked closely with CEO in providing features for different clients.
imageAlt: The Sacramento Bridge. Image by Craig Pattenuade.

name: CLC Inc
description: Thru my freeCodeCamp network, I was hired as a Software Engineer working on the MERN stack. Also supported legacy code written in Backbone and JQuery while created new features for financial products.
imageAlt: The Capitol dome's interior. Image by Ravi Krishnappa.

name: SBM Management
description: Another connection from freeCodeCamp resulted in a contract job to convert an Angular application to React. Worked closely with team to architect the FE infrastructure and re-building the whole application within a few months.
imageAlt: Historic Amtrak Trains in Old Sacramento. Image by Simon Hurry.

name: 4insite
description: Upon termination of the contract with SBM, I was offered a full-time position where I continue to support existing features, creating new ones and improving FE instrastructure. Two years later, I was promoted to Lead FE Engineer.
imageAlt: Tower Records building in frame. Image by Justin W.

name: Independent Contractor
description: Started consulting and providing full-stack services. Walked client through development and design process and guiding them to manage their own content.
imageAlt: A field of sunflowers. Image by Sofia Ornelas.
